 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָוָה‎</span>] **verb** only **Pi\`el** (in poetry &amp; late), ==tell, declare== (Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַוֵּי‎</span>) — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְחַוֶּהֿ‎</span> [[Ps.19.3|Ps 19:3]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַוֶּה‎</span> [[Job.32.10|Job 32:10]]; [[Job.32.17|Job 32:17]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַוְךָ‎</span> [[Job.15.17|Job 15:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַוֶּךָּ‎</span> [[Job.36.2|Job 36:2]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַוֹּת‎</span>; — ***declare, make known***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּ֑עַת‎</span> [[Ps.19.3|Ps 19:3]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַיְלָה‎</span>, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְלַיְלָה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַבִּיעַ אֹמֶר‎</span>); with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֵּעִי‎</span> [[Job.32.10|Job 32:10]]; [[Job.32.17|Job 32:17]] with 2 accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאִירָא מֵחַוֹּת דֵּעִי אֶתְכֶם‎</span> [[Job.32.6|Job 32:6]], followed by suffix person + object clause, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאֲחַוֶּ֑דָּ כִּיעֿוֺד לֶאֱלוֺהַּ מִִלּים׃‎</span> [[Job.36.2|Job 36:2]] ***and I will shew thee that*** (there are) ***yet words for God***; followed by suffix person only [[Job.15.17|Job 15:17]] — read probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאֲחַוֶּה‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאֲקַוֶּה‎</span> [[Ps.52.11|Ps 52:11]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] and others
